name: Offroad Truck Stunt Drive
description: Offroad Truck Stunt Drive is a brand new story game where you can enjoy cargo simulation and crazy stunts on same time. Go on your truck driving. Roads are curly and fuel is short. This Offroad Truck Stunt Drive game gives you a chance to be a real truck driver of this cargo truck, which is a mountain truck. Let's go on to ride this  truck having real features. This Truck Driving game is very hard to play. Drive this cargo truck or grand truck, to be a super hero of this truck. It's time to simulate your drive for furious jungle with dinosaure.
